name: Bargain ssp Puzzle Grid
description:
The Game is a simple Puzzle, But Fun and challenging to Play. Made to be Solitaire , you try to get the Highest score you can for the board. You Play by Rotating and Rolling the column's and Rows to create islands of connected cube's. the more you connect the Higher the board scores. you can lose points but the highest remains.

design is meant to be a simple mouse clicker that is casual and hard to play. You simply roll the columns and rows to make islands of cube's that's the simple concept. you can view your stats as you play and see just how many clicks and rolls you do. its a puzzler at its best simple.
